project.name: XMPP Chat Example Activity
project.description: This example activity shows the use of the Chat Service. The service can connect to a chat account and send and receive messages.

property.name: activity.example.chat.xmpp.username
property.description: The user name for the chat account to be used. This is usually added in the Live Activity configuration in the Master Web Admin.

property.name: activity.example.chat.xmpp.password
property.description: The password for the chat account to be used. This is usually added in the Live Activity configuration in the Master Web Admin.
